doc.name: JAIImageReader
doc.description: This actor reads an image from a file or a URL. The file or URL is specified using any form acceptable to FileParameter. Supports BMP, FPX, GIF, JPEG, PNG, PBM, PGM, PPM, and TIFF file formats.
doc.author: James Yeh, Steve Neuendorffer, Christopher Brooks
doc.property: The file name or URL from which to read. This is a string with any form accepted by FileAttribute. The initial value is "$CLASSPATH/doc/img/PtolemyII.jpg".
